title: C. One-Based Arithmetic
statement: Prof. Vasechkin wants to represent positive integer n as a sum of addends, where each addends is an integer number containing only 1s. For example, he can represent 121 as 121=111+11+–1. Help him to find the least number of digits 1 in such sum.
inputSpecification: The first line of the input contains integer n (1 ≤ n < 1015).
outputSpecification: Print expected minimal number of digits 1.
name: One-Based Arithmetic
